short_description: A neo-medieval seaside fortress on the bay of Cannes, transformed by American artists Henry and Marie Clews into a cultural sanctuary. Now operated by La Napoule Art Foundation, the chateau offers indoor and outdoor event spaces with Mediterranean views for weddings of up to 450 guests.
curfew: 11:00 PM outdoors (lounge music only) / 3:00 AM indoors
